ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Tiny Bubbles :)
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh.  I have a backpack full of drums and another backpack full of flutes. Guess I can dump the flutes. Gilgurth Bard of 24 Winces E ci ... From: Lonnie Lewis
ygData.messageBody:
Heh. I have a backpack full of drums and another backpack full of flutes.
Guess I can dump the flutes.

Gilgurth
Bard of 24 Winces
E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Lonnie Lewis [mailto:llewis@...]
Sent: Friday, June 09, 2000 10:29 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Tiny Bubbles :)


Raw bamboo works as a wind instrument? Good to know. When I first went to
Kunark, I made sure to have a couple extra drums and flutes in the bank.
Fortunately, I haven't died too much in Kunark, and when I do, I've almost
always had a cleric nearby for a handy dandy rez.

Are there any drum merchants in Kunark? Can I quit cluttering up my bank
with instruments?
